author: jameshe5018
content: Question on other client interpretation of healthy for endpoint `eth/v1/node/health` if the node is syncing is it considered healthy in this case?

author: tersec
content: https://ethereum.github.io/beacon-APIs/#/Node/getHealth specifically states syncing is HTTP code 206 and "ready" is 200. This is what Nimbus does

author: nflaig
content:
> Either the beacon node is syncing, or its execution node is optimistic or offline
if neither of these 3 cases is true, then we return 200, otherwise 206
